lead_paragraph: A son of the rancher Cliven Bundy was ordered to remain in federal custody on charges stemming from an armed confrontation with government agents in 2014.

headline.print_headline: Nevada: Judge Denies Release for a Bundy in a Conspiracy Case
headline.main: Nevada: Judge Denies Release for a Bundy in a Conspiracy Case

snippet: A son of the rancher Cliven Bundy was ordered to remain in federal custody on charges stemming from an armed confrontation with government agents in 2014.
abstract: Mel Bundy, son of rancher Cliven Bundy, is ordered to remain in federal custody while awaiting trial; he faces multiple charges stemming from armed confrontation with government agents in April 2014, for which he has pleaded not guilty.
